short_description: Home to the Himalayas and Mount Everest, Nepal is a must-visit destination for outdoor enthusiasts and spiritual seekers alike. Trek to Everest Base Camp, go white-water rafting on the Trisuli River, and explore the ancient city of Kathmandu

alcohol_info: A policy has reportedly been adopted that would make the legal purchase age 21. However, there are exceptions to underage consumption for purposes of religious ceremonies

tipping.hotels: Many large hotels include service charge or you can tip 10% of the bill
tipping.guides: For trekking tours, tip at least USD 10 per day
tipping.restaurants: Restaurant are not customary in Nepal
tipping.taxis: Taxi drivers in Nepal do not expect a tip, but a small tip, such as extra change, will be greatly appreciated

weather.title: Nepal has a diverse climate due to its varying topography. The Terai region has a subtropical climate with hot summers and mild winters. The hilly regions have a temperate climate, while the mountainous areas, including the Himalayas, have a cold alpine climate

when_to_visit.title: Blooming flowers
when_to_visit.short_description: Mild temperatures and clear skies during this period. Famous for blooming rhododendron across the forests

when_to_visit.title: Best for trekking
when_to_visit.short_description: Stable weather with dry conditions and clear skies. This is considered peak trekking season in Nepal, with popular routes like the Everest Base Camp and Annapurna Circuit attracting numerous adventure enthusiasts

when_to_visit.title: Monsoon season
when_to_visit.short_description: Low season with clouds, higher rainfall and mud. Some areas are inaccessible but rain shadowed areas like Upper Mustang can still be visited

when_to_visit.title: Winter
when_to_visit.short_description: Extremely cold, particularly in northern regions

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Nepal is during the spring months of March to May and the autumn months of September to November when the weather is mild, and you can enjoy clear skies, ideal trekking conditions, and vibrant cultural festivals
